ai-patthana12.17:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.17:0.3_0: Taking the fetters, and so on,
ai-patthana12.17:1.1_0: didn’t go for refuge to the Buddha, the teaching, or the Saṅgha.
ai-patthana12.17:2.1_0: ... five objects the result of the universal objects ...
ai-patthana12.17:3.1_0: go for refuge to the teaching ...
ai-patthana12.17:3.1_1: The flood doesn’t give rise to the teaching. ...
ai-patthana12.17:3.1_2: You shouldn’t give rise to a teaching. ...
ai-patthana12.17:3.1_3: You shouldn’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-patthana12.17:3.1_4: We haven’t gone for refuge to the teaching ...
ai-patthana12.17:3.1_5: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana12.17:4.1_0: ... five objects the result of the universal objects ...
